an4.136:1.1: “Mendicants, these four individuals are found in the world.
an4.136:1.3: One individual has not fulfilled ethics, immersion, or wisdom.
an4.136:2.1: One individual has fulfilled ethics, but not immersion or wisdom.
an4.136:3.1: One individual has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but not wisdom.
an4.136:4.1: One individual has fulfilled ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.136:4.2: These are the four individuals found in the world.”
